description: Give your immune system a boost with this tasty blend of botanicals, vitamins and electrolytes. Each sip has the bright zing of tangerine and finishes with the smooth sweetness of blueberries. Nuun has developed their immunity line for those times you aren’t feeling yourself. Whether you're stressed, over-tired, finishing a grueling training session or coming down with something, these effervescent tablets help give you a lift.Ingredients: dextrose, citric acid, natural flavors, beet powder color, avocado oil, stevia leaf extract and rice concentrate.Each tablet contains 125 mg of Nuun’s proprietary herbal blend that boosts your immune system and reduces inflammation - blend contains: elderberry extract, organic ginger powder, organic turmeric, echinacea purpurea.Dissolve one tablet in 500ml of water.Contains 10 tablets.
name: Nuun Hydration Immunity Tablets Blueberry Tangerine
